name: CHAIN SWORD
description:
CHAIN SWORD is a small single-screen multiplayer game, where you try to defeat the other players using a sword that is also a grappling hook. The level rotates after one player gets 10 wins. There are several maps to play!

PLAY IN YOUR BROWSER

Keyboard: two players via WASD + O, P and ARROWS + Z, X.

Gamepads: 2-4 players. This is the best way to play!

Send me feedback via sww@eight45.net
